whyUs.intro: We're a family-run business with deep roots in Lancashire's agricultural and construction sectors. Our reputation is built on reliability, quality workmanship, and honest communication.
points: Over 15 years serving Lancashire farms and construction sites
Comprehensive insurance and health & safety compliance

testimonial.quote: Lancashire Ag completed our farm drainage project on time and within budget. The difference to our land productivity has been remarkable. Professional, reliable, and a pleasure to work with.
testimonial.author: James Mitchell

about.story: Lancashire Ag was founded to provide professional, reliable contracting services to the agricultural and construction sectors across Lancashire. We understand the unique challenges of working in rural environments and on active construction sites. Our team combines traditional craftsmanship with modern equipment and techniques to deliver outstanding results.
